item.title: CVE-2024-20036|2024-03-04T02:43:51.821Z -- MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6835, MT6855, MT6879, MT6886, MT6895, MT6983, MT6985, MT8792, MT8796, MT8798
item.description: In vdec, there is a possible permission bypass due to a permissions bypass. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08509508; Issue ID: ALPS08509508.
